column4: Is there any way that I can host files through this old laptop, like a file server?  Do I have to use ftp of could I use http for easier use?
ok thanks, do you know of any good sftp tutorials?
do a sudo apt-get install openssh-server, then give each user an account on your machine sudo adduser username, give your server a static ip then they can connect using filezilla of gftp
